department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Environmental Nanotechnology
course.description: Introduces students to the environmental aspects of nanoscience and nanotechnology. We will study the fundamental physical chemical properties, characterization, environmental implications, and environmental applications of nanoparticles and nanomaterials. Case studies from recent publications on engineered carbon nanomaterials such as fullerenes, carbon nanotubes, and graphene will be discussed.
course.prerequisites: College-level chemistry course or equivalent and Physical Sciences 1 or equivalent.
